description: This file defines a Cohere-based reranker class for reordering documents based on relevance scores, integrating with the Cohere API.

classes.name: CohereReranker
classes.description: A reranker class that uses the Cohere API to re-rank documents based on relevance.

methods.name: client
methods.description: Property that initializes and returns the Cohere client instance.

methods.name: _rerank
methods.description: Internal method that performs the reranking of documents using the Cohere API.

methods.name: rerank
methods.description: Public method that wraps _rerank with exception handling to ensure robustness.
